column4: anyone else have any thoughts on getting the ati drivers to work?
the latest ati drivers work for me, what's wrong?
the drivers are installed, so is the restricted modules package. i've changed my xorg file to use fglrx driver, but the driver isn't being used
are you using warty or hoary?
fglrxinfo says mesa stuff is used, and extension "XFree-86 DRI is missing on display :0.0"
are you using xfree86 or xorg?
can you post the contents of /var/log/Xorg.0.log somewhere I can see it?
dpkg -l : ii  xserver-xorg   6.8.2-2        the X.Org X server
i've been getting weird redraw problems which i hope this fixes. like when i switch desktops, some text isnt redrawn completely. i'll see how it goes
you don't even need it in your modules file, the server will load it if it's not already when the server starts
